benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/tags - Add tags to account

covered: Valid POST payloads: tests cover successful tag additions (multiple, single, large payloads, and duplicates).
Comprehensive error handling and validation: tests cover 400 responses for empty/malformed payloads, invalid IDs, missing headers, and non-existent resources.
Authorization: tests verify 401 Unauthorized when authentication is missing (TC15).
Server error handling: 503 when tag service is unavailable (TC16).
Edge cases and robustness: tests cover header injection (TC22), concurrency (TC21), performance (TC20), regression scenarios (TC23, TC24).
Pagination/query parameters handling: TC06 confirms that limit/offset/sort parameters are ignored in this endpoint.
gaps: Actual pagination semantics and total/result counting for paginated responses are not tested beyond ignoring parameters.
403 Forbidden authorization scenario is not tested.
Rate limiting/throttling behavior is not tested.
Internal server error (500) scenarios are not tested (tests cover 503).
Additional input validation scenarios for content-type or extra top-level fields not fully explored.
recommendations: Add tests for 403 Forbidden to cover authorization edge case beyond missing token.
Add tests for 500 Internal Server Error and other backend failure modes.
Add rate limiting and load-testing to validate performance under high load.
Add checks for caching headers (ETag, Cache-Control) on responses.
Add dedicated tests for real pagination semantics (GET-style paging) and edge-case parameter values (negative/non-numeric).
Enhance security tests with more header validation and sanitization cases.
